website_summaries.verdict: A large capacity smoker that is easy to operate and delivers delicious meat.
pros: Offers 3.4 cubic feet of cooking capacity
Sausage hanger is a nice touch
Two-door design separates the food chamber from the heat source and smoking chamber
Tempered glass window allows you to view food
cons: A good smoker for larger projects, but might be too big for household smoking

customer_reviews.title: All the food items that he has cooked in this cooker have been cooked to perfection and with the best flavor imagined
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son for Christmas. He had been wanting a smoker for quite some time. They go camping quite often. He has used this dozens of times and loves it. All the food items that he has cooked in this cooker have been cooked to perfection and with the best flavor imagined. Everyone who has eaten food from this smoker can't believe the flavor, and texture. Of course he experiments with flavors and different smoke flavor, but there hasn't been one meat item we haven't liked. He is getting so much use out of this smoker. I am glad I purchased it for him. A great Christmas gift for anyone who loves good food.
customer_reviews.author: Yacccky

customer_reviews.title: ... this product a few weeks ago and it worked great on the first batch of ribs
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this product a few weeks ago and it worked great on the first batch of ribs. I do recommend monitoring the temperature with another thermometer (seems to be a common issue with all smoker thermometers). The unit was very easy to assemble and it is easy to use for a beginner. You can get up to 4 full racks in the smoker if you can maneuver them properly. Overall I would definitely recommend it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley.s.Philipson

customer_reviews.title: It smokes well and produces some nice tender meals
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten my money out of this unit. I have barbecued and smoked almost every weekend since I bought it. It smokes well and produces some nice tender meals. On Tuesday, I smoked a 15 pound Boston Butt and right now, I've got a 12-pound brisket smoking. It's been smoking for about 13 hours so far - only 2 or 3 hours to go.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Gastauer

customer_reviews.title: ... easiest to put together but the instructions were much better than IKEA's
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't easiest to put together but the instructions were much better than IKEA's. For the price, you cannot match the quality, rack space, and convenience of this smoker. It's not quite "set it and forget it" but it's the next best thing in my opinion. Heats up quickly (I advise getting some BBQ seal for the door for smoke retention). Racks can be removed easily for ribs. It can fit a lot of meat on despite it's slender appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Dominick

customer_reviews.title: Good smoker, but watch the door!
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered two of these now and BOTH times the door has been dented!! The first time, we had to get another door because the dent was so bad it wouldn't shut and seal, this time we think it will be usable, but seriously! Love the smoker when it comes as it should (brand new with no dents), but you're batting 0 for 2 Smoke Hollow!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda D.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on Amazon and have used it for over 3 years. It has held up very well. I seasoned it before the 1st use and it has held up very well no rust or anything! I smoke pork 90% of the time but I have smoked beef and poultry in it and I have not had any complaints about any of the food even vegetables come out great.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: First smoke went well. It doesn’t seal up very ...
customer_reviews.text: First smoke went well. It doesn’t seal up very well around the door but I can fix that. It works as advertised. Second smoke. Same results. I cooked chicken. Boneless pork ribs and beef fajitas. I’m using pellets that I moistened before heating. Makes a lot of flavorful smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Mohler

customer_reviews.title: This item did not arrive with grates. We intended ...
customer_reviews.text: This item did not arrive with grates. We intended to use this smoker for Thanksgiving, but without grates that is not going to be possible. This was the biggest let down of anything I have ever ordered online, not to mention a huge inconvenience that we are going to have to try and get another smoker the day before Thanksgiving. Another downfall of this brand is the instructions that are very unclear.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Burgner

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it so far
customer_reviews.text: All in all I like this smoker. The temperature has been the most challenging, getting it exactly where I want it, but so far the meats that I have smoked (pork butt) have tasted very good.
customer_reviews.author: Dano

customer_reviews.title: The second one came with no issues and we're super stoked to keep using it
customer_reviews.text: We've only used this once so far, but we were thrilled with the results. We did have to replace the first one, because it came damaged, and had a hiccup trying to figure out who to call to get it resolved. I ended up just returning the damaged one, and then reordering the smoker. The second one came with no issues and we're super stoked to keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good smoker for the price. Only trouble I have is keeping temps high on a windy day. If you want to do a fast smoke at 275-300 deg it just won't do it. I will try to seal some of the bottom vents to get higher next time I do a fast smoke. For lower long smokes it works great 👍
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, stay away from!
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it! At one year and one week the electronic ignition switch broke...only third time using it! The manufacturer did not have parts, did not know when they would be back in stock AND could not tell me how much they would be! I have extended warranty, but little good that will do me!
customer_reviews.author: HdwMan

customer_reviews.title: A great value.
customer_reviews.text: A great beginner's smoker. Well worth the price paid. The water pan makes it hard to ruin the meat. We have done chicken and a whole brisket. The brisket turned out fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Colby Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: and works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Smoker was delivered much sooner than expected, was virtually straight-forward to assemble, and works like a charm. Of course there are a couple of things I wished were different, but the unit functions as advertised. One would be hard pressed to find a better value!
customer_reviews.author: J. Major

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker
customer_reviews.text: Nice size smoker that can fit all you need in it. Have smoked jerky, turkey, many other things and always get good results
customer_reviews.author: Patty Walters

customer_reviews.title: This thing works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Construction seems good and when in use it holds temp with less than 5 degree variance. I’ve done beef n pork so far and both came out great, complaints would be thermostat is 30+ under temp and vents do not seem to matter where there set
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... looked at smokers for a while and I'm very happy that I bought this one
customer_reviews.text: I've looked at smokers for a while and I'm very happy that I bought this one. It's big enough to smoke a turkey and some pork chops at the same time, but small enough to take it camping. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: ... material and seal the door and you've got one awesome smoker. We love it
customer_reviews.text: Get some gasket material and seal the door and you've got one awesome smoker. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Z's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very happy, much less work than feeding wood all day. Makes a mighty fine brisket.
customer_reviews.author: WW

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband for Father’s Day. He loves it. Easy to use would buy again. Meat is tender and clean up is easy
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hart

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Loving this product. We are smoking meat once or twice a week now and loving the smoky flavor it is producing.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well. One piece was missing, but not essential. Another piece had chipped paint.
customer_reviews.author: JJ and Jay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works just as advertised. It does everything I was wanting. It is a very good smoker for the money.
customer_reviews.author: ERH101

customer_reviews.title: ... for the price I think it does a really good job. So far I've done a 10lb pork ...
customer_reviews.text: My first smoker and honestly for the price I think it does a really good job. So far I've done a 10lb pork shoulder, burgers and sausages and everything has come out delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He smoked boneless ribs the other night and they turned out perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new smoker. He smoked boneless ribs the other night and they turned out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: SAKunz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect smoker for me
customer_reviews.text: Excellent smoker. I smoke about 12 pounds of wings per week with this. I have also smoke ribs and salmon. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Tito Monsoon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, the price was amazing. Easy to use. I purchased it as a birthday present for my son. He was overjoyed when he got it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin LeFlore

customer_reviews.title: Great Smoker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this smoker for my husbands birthday. We are very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Dean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for summer travel.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband so we can take in our RV to smoke salmon. He is very pleased with it's size and weight.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great flavors and even better price
customer_reviews.text: The first one I was sent was a xmas gift and was smashed in the box. Amazon quickly resolved the issue and my husband loves it now. Great flavors and even better price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa E

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used a lot allready buying a 40" lob it so much
customer_reviews.author: ED SNIPES

customer_reviews.title: but it worked wonderfully. I used to smoke on a gas grill
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once, but it worked wonderfully. I used to smoke on a gas grill, which is fine, but using a smoker gave me a much better smoke ring with less effort.
customer_reviews.author: Citizen Snips

customer_reviews.title: Love our smoker!
customer_reviews.text: Smoked pork shoulder, brisket, pork chops and fish. All turned out well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big dent and broken rack
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a birthday present and it’s not fun when your brother opens it and has a big dent and Broken rack
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: excellent product I am the hit of all my
customer_reviews.text: excellent product I am the hit of all my parties
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Good smoker
customer_reviews.text: Some of the reviewers didn't give this product good reviews, but I decided to take a chance because it was reasonably priced and I'm not experienced at smoking meat. As others found, two parts came broken (why would a worker knowingly put a bent rack in the box?), and I called the manufacturer. No hassles, no questions, and three days later we received replacements. I've smoked a turkey breast, which come out perfectly. I had no problems regulating the heat by only closing and opening the bottom vents per the included manual. I recommend this smoker.
customer_reviews.author: K K Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Love this smoker
customer_reviews.text: Love this smoker. used it at least twice a week since I got it. Snow, rain, shine doesn't matter. just churns out great smoked meats
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's a good smoker. We had a little trouble with the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good smoker. We had a little trouble with the assembly but not too much. It's been a fun learning experience.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Been very happy!! Everyone has like the meet
customer_reviews.text: Been enjoyable! Done Beef Roast, Brisket Chicken and Salmon. Been very happy !! Everyone has like the meet.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't do well in really cold weather. Tried ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't do well in really cold weather. Tried to cook the Thanksgiving Turkey in about 40degrees. Had to finish the turkey off in the oven in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Merrie C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great but when we finally opened it
customer_reviews.text: Works great but when we finally opened it, because it was a Christmas gift, we found out that the door has a nice kink in it. It still works just an eye sore.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: My husband is absolutely in love with this
customer_reviews.text: My husband is absolutely in love with this! I ordered it for him for his birthday and he has used it once a week since he got it
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker, recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.text: Just finished my second batch of smoked meat and it smells incredible. My first batch was great and we really enjoyed eating it. This smoker is exactly what I wanted. We had an electric smoker previously and enjoyed it, but it had problems that this one does not. I would recommend this to anyone who enjoys smoked meat. Today, I did ground pork burgers, a loin pork roast, three boneless chicken breast, and a whole chicken. The whole process took about 2 1/2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Aggie

customer_reviews.title: I love this smoker
customer_reviews.text: I love this smoker. I smoked a turkey, some baby back ribs and a brisket for the fourth of July. Everything came out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent, for the money seems to hold temp well ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent, for the money seems to hold temp well just keep out of the wind, slight breeze blows my fire out.
customer_reviews.author: James Goble

customer_reviews.title: Works great now was a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Came with a broken part. New part showed up fore days later. Works great now was a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mckuhen

customer_reviews.title: Very good home smoker at a very good price...
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty basic propane gas heated vertical smoker. You cannot cold smoke with it and it is difficult to keep the heat control under 200 degrees, but overall, it does what it advertises and smokes most meats very well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, damaged product without all parts!
customer_reviews.text: Mine can dented! There was no ignitor wire! The directions I found to be very confusing and with small diagrams. Haven’t used yet but somebody is slipping on wuality control and inspections! Ordered in plenty of time with 2 day shipping so I could smoke a turkey for thanksgiving. Guess I will be using my oven. Was told that it would be 7-10 fays before the ignitor wire gets here! Very disappointed! If it had not been so hard to assemble I would send it back!!!
customer_reviews.author: Preston R. Savell

customer_reviews.title: Have used SMOKER several times and am very satisfied with it
customer_reviews.text: Have used SMOKER several times and am very satisfied with it, and plan on using it very often this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Denny Gulliford

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged due to flimsy craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived in great shape, with the molded foam pieces holding the smoker securely. We unpacked it to find the lower hinge completely snapped. If this item isn't durable enough to withstand being shipped so securely, surrounded by thick foam pieces, I can't imagine it's going to hold up to outdoor cooking. Returning and won't be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely_limes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift bought for my son and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Martens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good smoker does great easy to use shipped fast All I can say is its GREAT Thanks Ron
customer_reviews.author: Ron Rogers

customer_reviews.title: it works but when the smoker arrived there was a ...
customer_reviews.text: it works but when the smoker arrived there was a few shelves that where bent I had to bend them back but product works
customer_reviews.author: Chad Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Nice smoker, great value.
customer_reviews.text: Very good smoker. Everyone loves the results. Can't see how the ones twice the price could give better results. Only drawback might be the size, but it is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: J. Crouch

customer_reviews.title: I've now used it to do some amazing ribs. I'm addicted
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to assemble. It arrived with a couple of broken parts. Their customer service was outstanding. New parts arrived in just a few days even though I had been told 7 to 10 business days. I've now used it to do some amazing ribs. I'm addicted!
customer_reviews.author: Ryk Warren-Haviland

customer_reviews.title: Good overall smoker
customer_reviews.text: Good overall smoker. Kinda hard to assemble but if you're not an idiot, you'll do fine. Decent smoker for cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jerin Summers

customer_reviews.title: I just enjoyed using this smoker
customer_reviews.text: I just enjoyed using this smoker, it was a must have for BBQ.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good smoker!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything was good out of the box. The smoker will run on a 15 lb bottle of propane for about 20 hours on low heat. Overall the product has been good for me with smoking ribs and pork butts! It's light and retains good heat, even in this Kansas wind. I think I will by another one to take to the lake!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my boyfriend as a birthday gift. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend as a birthday gift. When we opened the box to assemble this is how we found it!! Needless to say we are less them impressed!!
customer_reviews.author: msummers07

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A few missing parts, one of the legs was bent and is a bit wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: ReadingMakesMeHappy

customer_reviews.title: Great lil' smoker
customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying this smoker and use it almost every weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Carmel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent beginner to advanced smoker
customer_reviews.text: Excellent beginner to advanced smoker. Cons? - Mine came in beat up in many areas in a perfect retail box... A few tweaks and adjustments and it works fine. Quality control could be far better. Don't let that con fool you though. This lil smoker is awesome once you get the hang of it. The only thing I haven't tried yet, is a turkey.
customer_reviews.author: Shiprekd

customer_reviews.title: Very Simple to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very Simple to setup and use. Takes a few tries to get it just right but after just 2 smokes I am getting tons of complements.
customer_reviews.author: Richard K. Jeary

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with broken grate holder, so the water/smoking tray cannot stay even. Other than that a decent smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Mz. Jeep

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, but I have owned better. Wood tray is tiny and pulling it out to fill can be a hassle. You have to lift it up and then pull it out. Mine came partially assembled and I think it must have been a Friday because the rack guides were installed backwards. I wouldn't buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Dirty Rat Ink

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service! The smoker works as expected. With LP you can choose infinite temperatures and I wanted the extra BTUs as the winters here can be quite cold. I was concerned electric units wouldn't be able to keep up. The smoker had a couple of parts that weren't quite right. I contacted Smoke Hollow customer assistance and they mailed replacements immediately and without question. A very pleasant experience.
customer_reviews.author: Tom D

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: self-lighter system wouldn't work but lights easily with a torch.
customer_reviews.author: john s.

customer_reviews.title: Dammit
customer_reviews.text: Be careful the grills will fallout dump your food on the ground😡
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The smoker itself is great and we use it almost every day
customer_reviews.text: The smoker itself is great and we use it almost every day. However, I cannot figure out how it takes 5 days for the smoker to get from Goodyear, Az to Phoenix, Az. Had I known that it was going to take that long, I either would have offered to pick it up myself (as it is only about an hour away) or purchased something else.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Won't know if it's a good product until that is fixed
customer_reviews.text: Product was damaged when arrived. The side pieces where the racks slide into were bent and one was completely broken. Won't know if it's a good product until that is fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Dupre

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband a few weeks ago and he loves it. It's a small smoker that works like a big one. First time he used it he smoked a turkey breast and a pork butt at the same time. Worked great and it was raining and nasty all day. Not the greatest conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Nena

product_meta.title: Smoke Hollow 30164G 30-Inch Propane Gas Smoker
product_meta.description: Offering over 1.5cu.'. Of cooking capacity, the 30" outdoor leisure gas smoker features 3 chrome-plated cooking grids, 1 powder-coated steel wood chip pan & a commercial-quality temperature Gauge. Fully-welded, 1Piece steel cabinet construction guarantees consistent temperatures. Porcelain coated water/drip pan resists rust for long-lasting use. Stainless steel tube burner provides 10, 000 BTUs of constant heat for smoking meat & fish. Cool-touch, spring wire door handle features a "sure-lock" latch.
feature_bullets: Three removable chrome plated cooking grids with variable grid levels
Cool-touch, spring wire door handle with "sure-lock" latch

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars139 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
